go_data.justification: LT-betaR is a member of the TNFR family and interacts with TRAF proteins.
TRAF5 was implicated in NF-kappaB activation mediated by LTbetaR.
LT-betaR interacts directly with TRAFs via a short stretch of amino acids within its cytoplasmic tail.
The TRAF family proteins interact directly with LT-betaR and play pivotal roles in the activation of signaling pathways induced by this receptor.
